rules: Do NOT scale body text linearly (it becomes too big). Keep body text readable (14-16px).
Scale Headings (h1, h2) by 1.2x on Tablet.

changes_needed: Replace fixed 'getGridItemSize' logic with dynamic column calculation based on breakpoints.
Update 'gridItem' width calculation to use variable column count (3 vs 4 vs 5).
Genre Cards: Allow width to grow or increase fixed width to 160px on Tablet.
LOGO_SIZE: Change from fixed 190 to dynamic (Phone: 190, Tablet: 350).
Layout: On Tablet, consider using a split view (Artwork Left, Controls Right) OR just centered with larger artwork.
Equalizer & Controls: Scale buttons slightly (1.2x) for better touch targets on large screens.
Discover Banner: Increase width from 300 to 450 on Tablet.
Genre Chips: Increase padding and font size slightly.
Remove fixed widths in 'largeContainer' (150px) if possible, or scale it to 200px on Tablet.
Update fixed width/height for Tablet variant.

utility_functions.getGridMetrics: function getGridMetrics(width) { if(width >= 1024) return { cols: 5, gap: 16 }; if(width >= 768) return { cols: 4, gap: 12 }; return { cols: 3, gap: 8 }; }

implementation_steps: 1. Modify 'HomeScreen' to use 'useWindowDimensions' and new grid logic.
2. Update 'PlayerScreen' to scale artwork and adjust layout for Tablet.
3. Refactor 'StationCard' and 'GenreCard' to accept size props or adapt to context.
4. Verify 'DiscoverScreen' horizontal scrolls look good with larger items on Tablet.
5. Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
universal_guidelines: Maintain the Dark Theme aesthetic (Black/Dark Grey backgrounds).
Do NOT break the existing Phone layout. Use conditional logic (isTablet ? ... : ...).

image_assets.instructions: Use existing image URLs or fallbacks. Do not replace working images.
